alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 9:00PM MST until January 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 6000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible overnight and lasting into Monday morning. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 8 PM Today to 8 AM Monday: Doney Park 1 to 3 inches Flagstaff 2 to 4 inches Forest Lakes 5 to 9 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 3 inches Williams 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
